programme.desc: Rupert Builds A Nest - Rupert and Ping Pong find a broken bird's nest, containing two eggs, which the Fox Twins have accidentally knocked out of a tree. The Mummy bird is frantic and the friends are determined to save the eggs.

programme.desc: Rupert And The Star Child - Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her ‘twinkle'

programme.title: My Life Me Ep3
programme.desc: Big Man On Canvas - Raffi's win at the district art show hurtles Birch into the five stages of grief, her reactions throwing her podmates for a loop. Luckily, Liam's hip to what's going on thanks to a book Mr. Towes has assigned him. While Sandra trails Liam in hopes of seeing some emotional fireworks on Birch's part, Raffi can't quite get over the idea that Birch wouldn't be happy for his success.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep4
programme.desc: The Pencil Assassin - Birch is initially aghast when Jason publishes her Manga “sample” in the school paper, but soon succumbs to the allure of popularity. As Birch's social status soars, her podmates become laughingstocks. Sandra's retaliation eventually brings the two girls together in their fight against the unethical editor of The Cosmos Chronicle.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.desc: Impatient Christopher - Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep128
programme.desc: The Statue of Friendship - Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Blue's Beach Bonanza - We've set up a tubular pretend beach in the backyard and play a game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to see there. We'll learn what items sink and float, and swim underwater to learn about camouflage with the help of our ocean friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep224
programme.desc: Pups Save Skye - Skye is on her way to Jake's Mountain when she crash lands in the snow. Ryder calls Everest to save the day!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'.

programme.desc: Double Trouble / Box Not So Clever - In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons - Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington Gets Fit - It's the annual fun run in Windsor Gardens park, Paddington however is not very fit so Mrs. Bird decides to train him!

programme.desc: The Driving Force - When Starla the friendly cowgirl truck loses one of her pistons, Blaze and AJ set out to get it back. But they’ll have to hurry before Crusher gets his greedy tires on it!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Tool Duel - Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blaze's help to get them back!

programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep520
programme.desc: Fogzilla! - It's Lighthouse Keeper Deema's birthday! But when a monster named Fogzilla keeps blowing out her lighthouse, she needs to figure out how to get Captain Molly's ship, carrying her birthday cake, to shore, or there won't be a party!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.desc: Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band - Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket – and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep220
programme.desc: Mystery of the Missing Pies - Mr. Salt's pies keep disappearing.Where did the pies go?! In this very mysterious episode, we're detectives and play Blue's Clues to find the missing pies.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Sky Art / The Great Race - Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIre Engine / Paddington Joins a Club - Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Paddington's Rocking Chair Repair - Jonathan Judy and Paddington accidentally break Mrs. Bird's much-loved rocking chair! How will they fix it before she finds out?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Bouncy Tires - When Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally puts on a set of “Super Bouncy Tires,” he bounces out of control! Now Blaze and AJ have to experiment to find a substance adhesive enough to stop their bouncing buddy.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Stuntmania! - Darington has built the ultimate stunt-track, and every Monster Machine in town is coming to see the show! But when a jealous Crusher tricks Darington and sends him far, far away, it’s up to Blaze and AJ to rescue him.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep521
programme.desc: Bigfoot Crossing! - On the hottest day of the year, it's Park Rangers Goby and Gil's job to make sure that pedestrians can make it safely to the lake to swim. But when Bigfoot swipes the park's stop signs, will anyone be able to cross the road for a dip?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep522
programme.desc: A Load of Litterbugs! - On the U.S.S. Recycler, Captain Deema and her crew strive to leave every planet cleaner than they found it. But their mission is put to the test when a crew of messy Litterbugs, led by the evil Garbage Khan, take over their ship!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep620
programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Shooting Star - Anna and her friends want to watch Shooting Stars - but Froga is scared of the dark! With a little encouragement (and a visit to her Night Tomato) Froga conquers her fears and has a wonderful and memorable night with her friends.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Circus Celebration - Bubu's DVD of his favorite circus show does not work. The others create their own circus acts in the backyard. Doing acrobatics, juggling, and magic! Bubu joins them, even when the DVD player is fixed, they prefer to stay in the backyard to play!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Born To Be Wild - Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Meet Josh! - Something is missing from Blue's snack, so we play Blue's Clues with our new host, Josh, to find out what it is. With a little help from our old friends, Steve and Joe, Josh finds out what Blue wants with her snack.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Truckball Team-Up - Blaze discovers an exciting new sport called Truckball. But when Crusher and his team of cronies challenge him, Blaze must scour all of Axle City to put together a Truckball team before the big game.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep803
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rubble-Double / Pups Save a Clown - Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help. // The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clown's tiny clown car.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep804
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Cheetah - When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Kai Express / Ducknado - When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Catfish Capers - Lola tries her hand at being the park keeper for the day (Ian is on holiday) but things do not go according to her plan.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Paddington and the Fundraising Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure - The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep118

programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep607
programme.desc: Robo Puppy! - When a bossy cyborg named the Glitch hacks all the robots in Robotopolis and forces them to dance "The Robot," it's up to Robot Mechanic Molly and Robo Puppy to stop him before it's too late!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Blue's Big Imagination - Imagine along with Josh and Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue envisions a mysterious shape to be. We listen to a story created by Slippery, Magenta and Tickety and help Mr. Salt discover his own imagination!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Blue's Big Costume Parade - Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S5 Ep512
programme.desc: The Mechanic Team! - Blaze stops into Gabby's Garage for a quick repair - just as she gets an alert! Three far-flung trucks need her mechanical know-how! So, Blaze and AJ volunteer to help her take her garage on the go!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon / The Island of Lost Things - Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Pups Save a Monkey / Pups Save a Hoot - When Mandy the monkey escapes from her cage on the train, Ryder and the PAW Patrol are lead on a wild chase! // During a bad wind storm, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to save an Owl trapped in a blown over tree and reunite her baby.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons - Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime.

programme.desc: Mystery of the Missing Pies - Mr. Salt's pies keep disappearing.Where did the pies go?! In this very mysterious episode, we're detectives and play Blue's Clues to find the missing pies.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep112
programme.desc: Dizzy - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. The Teletubbies have fun getting dizzy on the Tubby Spinny.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Mouse - Dee encourages a friend to say mouse and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep51
programme.desc: Pack Up And Go - Po has to pack up his home so another Po can move into the house before sun down - and he needs help!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: It's time to dance - Gran Gran busts a groove when she teaches JoJo the moves to a traditional Saint Lucian dance. JoJo finds that learning a dance can take time, before realising she can put her own twist on it.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep39
programme.desc: Dad Dancing - Stan doesn't want to dance because he's not good at it, leaving Monty wondering whether you have to be good at things to enjoy them.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Do Elephants Forget - After he forgets to do his chores and empty his lunchbox, Monty wonders if it's possible for someone to remember everything.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep40
programme.desc: Early Baby - Bluey's playgroup is at odds when Indy's baby hospital collides with Rusty's knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they both find that their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep48
programme.desc: The Jigokudani Monkey Park, Japan - The Go Jetters fly to the rescue in Japan, as Glitch gets up to his usual monkey business.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: The Blue Mountains, Jamaica - Trouble brews in Jamaica when Glitch's campfire threatens a coffee plantation.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep39
programme.desc: The Sleepover - A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Diplodocus and Dung Beetle - When a dung beetle escapes from the museum, Andy travels back 152 million years to search for a new one.

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Farm Machines - Catie tests out three amazing machines that are used on farms: a tractor, an asparagus harvester and a combine harvester.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: Cook's Seaweed Rap - A high tide has resulted in the shipwreck being covered in seaweed, but Cook turns it into a performance: 21 Things You Can Do With Seaweed!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals, helping them to learn all about life in far away places, earning their Pen Pal badges and making some new friends in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Bioluminescent Bay, Puerto Rico - Glitch's bath time puts the creatures of Puerto Rico's Bioluminescent Bay in bubble-trouble.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: The Gobi Desert, Mongolia - Glitch's giant drill causes a dino-disaster for the team's fossil hunt in the Gobi Desert.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep11
programme.desc: Thomas and the Sounds of Sodor - The Fat Controller arrives at Tidmouth Sheds to give Thomas a special job. Thomas is to collect the Great Composer from Knapford and take him on a tour of the Island so that he can hear the sounds of Sodor.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: Birthday Buoy - Sarah, Duck and Flamingo arrange a nautical surprise for John's birthday.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Magic Panic - Umbrella needs Sarah and Duck's help after he promises to put on a magic show.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: Mobile Phones - Nora tries to make a tin can telephone call to Oliver.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep22
programme.desc: I Wish I Could Draw Like You - Everybody has to make a picture of their house for open day. Lotta, who is really good at houses, suddenly can't draw anymore, so the gang help her.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: The Thing That Was For Keeping - Gwen, Bob and Tony meet a very very big Dinopaw who shows them his items he wants to keep forever.

programme.desc: The Thing That Fell Down - When one of the twinkles in the night sky falls to the ground, Bob wants to see it up close.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: The Adventure - Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: The Get Indoors Badge - A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up all the creatures they can find outside and pile into the clubhouse for an impromptu party.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: The Camouflage Badge - The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about how to blend into their surroundings, earning their Camouflage Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: The Day Off Badge - It's Duggee's Day Off but it's not long before the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures on their own days off... earning their Day Off badges in the process!

programme.desc: Maasai Mara National Park, Kenya - The team roars into action as Glitch tries to take a selfie with a lion in the Maasai Mara.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs. Song
programme.desc: Main Event - As two of the top fighters in the UFC’s most stacked weight class, Cory Sandhagen and Song Yadong haveproven worthy of their elite status, but on September 18, only one of these bantamweights will emergevictorious in the pivotal five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of stirringknockout wins over Marlon Moraes and Frankie Edgar that skyrocketed him into the 135-pound title picture,Sandhagen is determined to get another shot at the belt, and the first order of business is beating China’sSong, an explosive force who has already dfeated the likes of Moraes, Marlon Vera and Julio Arce.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep2
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
